imdi:VocabularyDef.Name: Content-Involvement
imdi:VocabularyDef.imdi:Description: A list of values for the Involvement aspect of Content
imdi:VocabularyDef.imdi:Entry: Definition: Investigator asks speaker(s) to produce isolated phonemes/ words/ utterances / grammatical structures.
Definition: The researcher does not interfere verbally with the speech event (other than the researcher's mere presence).
Definition: No outside observer is present.
